verses.text: Mamin Jehová, swal in b'a t'ayach yujto ayin och t'a wilk'olal, ichato ay in ek' t'a jun olan te jul yich swab'i.
Mamin, ab' in jaj ticnaik, ak'cot tz'eyan a chiquin ayic tzin awaj in k'anan a colwal.
Mamin Jehová, q'uinaloc tato tz'ib'ab'il ko chukal uuj ¿mach wal ol stek'b'ej sb'ha t'a ichanh?
Palta a t'ayach tz'ilchaj niwank'olal cuuj, yic wach' ay elk'och t'a ko sat.
Mamin Jehová, t'a wal smasanil in k'ool tzin tanhwej yic tzach jawi in a colo'. Swak'och a lolonel yipoc in k'ool.
Mamin, ek'al in tanhwan a colwal t'a yichanh heb' winh stanhwumal chonhab' sgana spet sakb'i. Ek'alto in maclan a colwal chi' t'a heb' winh stanhwan heb' chonhab' chi'.
Cak'ecoch Jehová yipoc ko k'ool a onh israel onh tik, yujto ay yok'elk'olal, b'ecannhej sk'ool scolwaji.
A' ol onh colanel t'a yalanh smasanil ko mul.
